name: BookMarks Simplified
author: Chetan Dasauni
description: Now you can view and manage all your saved bookmarks just by a click of a button. Enable the extension and click the icon to start the magic. This extension was build with the purpose of making the bookmarks easily accessible and manageable.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' filesystem: http://localhost:* https://localhost:* https://apis.google.com https://ajax.googleapis.com.com https://www.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'
